aircraft.value: Wraith Silent - AC-7445-339 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Radar display intermittent blanking. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 11/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 14/11/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 16/11/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 17/11/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 18/11/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
